Package org.moddingx.libx.datagen.provider.patchouli.content

Class CaptionContent

java.lang.Object
org.moddingx.libx.datagen.provider.patchouli.content.CaptionContent
All Implemented Interfaces:
Content
Direct Known Subclasses:
RecipePage
@Experimental public abstract class CaptionContent extends Object implements Content
Base class for pages with some special content that can be followed by some text. This class will handle merging with other caption content and splitting the text up on multiple pages if required.

      protected abstract void specialPage(PageBuilder builder, @Nullable String caption)
      Builds the special page for this CaptionContent.
      Parameters:
      caption - The text for that special page. All other text is added to regular text pages after this one.

    • canTakeRegularText

      protected boolean canTakeRegularText()
      Gets whether regular (non-caption) text can merge to this CaptionContent. Default is false.

    • with

      public Content with(Content next)
      Description copied from interface: Content
      Chains a new content with this one. The default implementation returns a content, that just calls both Content.pages(PageBuilder) methods after each other.
